db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += quick quick3d
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick3d/helloqtquick3d INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ imageinstancetable.cpp
HEADERS += \ imageinstancetable.h
RESOURCES += \ qml.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ doc/src/*.*
CONFIG += qmltypes QML_IMPORT_NAME = HelloExample QML_IMPORT_MAJOR_VERSION = 1
